resources.string: Have fun with friends sending a SMS to their iPhone and see iOS to crash!
Send a danger SMS to phone number %1$s.\r\nARE YOU SURE?
Send a rescue SMS to phone number %1$s?
SMS sent! The iPhone will hang for 15 seconds on a black screen or the Apple logo and the messaging app is locked until you decide to rescue him.
SMS sent! Now ask someone else to send any SMS to phone %1$s and messaging app will be unlocked.
